text:
Lived here for 14 years, built my family here.  Although condo is old but the facilities are very well maintained and adequate.  Friendly community of neighbours.  Good mix of young couples and families living here. Never have any issue booking to use any facility eg BBQ pits etc   Was told by some neighbors that the Feng Shui here is very good thus many continue to stay here for ages.

For tenants, very reasonable rental for such a huge apartment.
For owners, good spacious apartment to build your families.  Next to one of the top school, Henry Park primary school.

Plenty of enrichment centres at Pandan Valley, which is a stone throw from Allsworth Park via the back gate.  Cold Storage, ghim moh market are all nearby.

We lived here for 2 years,  our unit was in a dilapidated breaking down
Condition,  very unreasonable land lord who neglected the unit completely and also withheld deposit. The previous tenant who lived in the same building also moved out due to similar situation.  Beware of renting  some of the units.  Especially aircon ,piping and old falling apart kitchen's
Resort-like living. Great location. Near to amenities: supermart, wet market, bus stops, etc. Quiet n serene too.
I lived in two different units at Allsworth Park during my 5 years in Singapore. I absolutely loved it there. Lovely community.
Decent condo at decent location with reasonable priced.
